name: Sonic The Hedgehog 2 (GG/SMS)
description:
Sonic Hedgehog is a high-speed action game that depicts a new story and adventure that is different from the Mega Drive version of the game of the same name.
In order to rescue his partner Tails, who has been captured by Dr. Eggman, he confronts six robots waiting in each zone. Aim for the final zone Crystal Egg where Tails is being held. You can also enjoy vehicle action such as a high-speed trolley that sails underground, and a hang glider that soars in the sky on the wind.
